Toggle Menu

salt.states.lvs_service

Management of LVS (Linux Virtual Server) Service

absent

Syntax

salt.states.lvs_service.absent(
								name,
								protocol=None,
								service_address=None
								)

Ensure the LVS service is absent.

Arguments

Name Description
name

The name of the LVS service
protocol

The service protocol
service_address

The LVS service address

present

Syntax

salt.states.lvs_service.present(
								name,
								protocol=None,
								service_address=None,
								scheduler='wlc'
								)

Ensure that the named service is present.

Arguments

Name Description
name

The LVS service name
protocol

The service protocol
service_address

The LVS service address
scheduler

Algorithm for allocating TCP connections and UDP datagrams to real servers.

Details

lvstest:
  lvs_service.present:
    - service_address: 1.1.1.1:80
    - protocol: tcp
    - scheduler: rr
